      • getHelpText

        public java.lang.String getHelpText()
        Get the help text. If a AuthenticationCustomScanInterface.onAuthenticationScanCanceled(AuthenticationCancelReason) or AuthenticationCustomScanInterface.onAuthenticationFaceInLandscape() is triggered, this function should be called again to check for a changed help text.
        Returns:
        the help text

      • getHelpAnimation

        public void getHelpAnimation(AuthenticationCustomAnimationView customAnimationView)
        Get the help animation for the currently active scan mode. If a fallback or AuthenticationCustomScanInterface.onAuthenticationScanCanceled(AuthenticationCancelReason) is triggered, this function should be called again to check for a changed help animation.

      • retryScan

        public void retryScan()
        Restart scan if the scan has been stopped
